metadata.name: Gremplin Ultra Deep Field
metadata.description:
Gremplin Ultra Deep Field is a 1/1 by Vincent van Toad in honour of Vincent van Gogh's 169th birthday on March 30, 2022.

The CC0 artwork unites two legendary projects in the public domain: CrypToadz by Gremplin and the Hubble Ultra Deep Field, taken by NASAâ€™s Hubble Space Telescope.

The NFT was minted with a Manifold smart contract. Each token represents 1/69 fractional ownership of the GUDF.

The story of the piece can be found at [gudf.org](https://www.gudf.org), and the 69" x 69" physical piece will reside at SpaceX Starbase, the gateway to Mars.

ðŸŒ»~ Vincent

*"For my part, I know nothing with any certainty, but the sight of the stars makes me dream."* - VvG
